content:
I’m trying to add my image library into Reservoir. It is located at https://github.com/varosi/Bitmap
I have tried to have all the Reservoir rules obeyed, but it still does not included. How can I debug what is happening?

Is it very recently that it met the criteria? There have been some GitHub incidents that last day or so. Both your repo and Resovoir show a Cannot retrieve latest commit at this time. message for me at the moment, so it seems plausible they are affected by an outage.
So I have to wait some days before rechecking?
Yes, I'd check back in a few days.
Thank you a lot! :folded_hands:
@Chris Henson it’s still not showing at Reservoir. Is the same problem with GitHub?
I have web access to GitHub. What branch is Reservoir trying to access - main or master?
I would just follow the instructions to file an issue on GitHub if it's still not appearing.
